page.title: 13The Apostolic Church,Lydden
page.content: On Sat.June 22nd the church was filled to capacity as the area's"Ladies'Rally" was held in Lydden Church.Next day there was the children's Sunday School as usual at 9.45am followed by the Worship and Communion Service until 12.30pm.There were twenty-five members present.The evening service at 6.30pm drew many other villagers and Pastor Meldrum preached.On Monday evening the children's Monday club took place between 6.30 and 8.00p.m.Twenty two village children arrived to be entertained by the church's drama group.On Wednesday the ladies'meeting was held.On Thursday at 7.30pm there was a ministry and prayer meeting.There was much discussion about Pastor Meldrum's message on forgiveness.On Friday the Dover and Lydden Christian Rock musical group"The Warning"will be performing at the 365Centre in Dover.
